name: Aveture
description:
ADVENTURE

You have to go with the player on an amazing journey in which you will draw your way to achieve the goal.

Aveture is a colorful 2D platformer where the player traverses levels along any path.

The game takes place in the future, in a world where the owners of special technologies can change the color of the world around them.

They can go through obstacles, thereby achieving their goals.

The main character is the owner of this ability. In addition, he knows how to instantly make rigid structures in front of him, which will help in this Avanture.

DEVRLOPMENT

The game is under development. It gets better and better.

Despite this, the game contains bugs that can somehow affect the gameplay. Bugs will be fixed by the release of the game.

Due to the fact that the game is under development, all in-game content is subject to change and revision.

For any cooperation, publishers and proposals, you can write to this mail: gleb.bortsov79@gmail.com.
